III.i.1.A.1.g
.
Service Department Findings Binding on VA With Respect to Service
Determinations as to certified dates of service made by the service department, including revisions of service dates, are binding on VA.
References
:Â  For information on
COD and minimum active duty service requirements, see
38 CFR 3.12
, and
38 CFR 3.12(a)
, and
revision of service dates via military correction board, see
Spencer v. West
,
13 Vet.App. 376 (2000).
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A - Establishing Veteran Status
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section A
